name: Space Crusaders (kyle's mit games)
description:
This is the very first game that I made, mostly to teach myself and get a feel for the engine. It's an homage to the Space Invaders arcade game. I own the code and graphics for this game, but the music does not belong to me.

Controls: A and D to move, left/right mouse button to fire, space to launch a bomb.

(Sfx cred: my sister)
